title: Apricot Glaze
ingredients: 4 tablespoons apricot brandy; or, an orange liqueur
instructions: In a blender or food processor, combine the apricot preserves and the liqueur, and puree until liquefied.  Store the glaze in a jar in the refrigerator.
remarks: Use what is needed; any left over can be used for breakfast rolls, etc.
yield: Enough for more pies than you can make!
source: The Pies Have It, by Rita Leinwand, Bon App√©tit, September 1977.
